short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Rate My Professors and grade distribution data for Clemson University professors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IRoar Premium is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance the Clemson University class registration experience. By integrating professor ratings from Rate My Professors and historical grade distribution data directly onto the class signup page, this extension helps Clemson students make more informed decisions about their course selections.

Key Features:
Professor Ratings at a Glance: Instantly view professors' ratings, average difficulty, and feedback from Rate My Professors. No more switching between tabs or searching for ratings – it's all embedded within your registration page.
Grade Distributions: Access grade distribution data for each course, showing how past students performed under specific professors. This feature provides valuable insights into grading patterns and expectations.
Streamlined Interface: IRoar Premium cleans up unnecessary text and neatly displays critical information, allowing for a smooth and efficient browsing experience even on smaller screens.
Why Install IRoar Premium?
IRoar Premium saves time and reduces guesswork in the registration process. It’s especially useful for students who want to balance their schedules, optimize their GPA, or avoid unexpectedly challenging courses. With key data points visible right on the signup page, you can make smarter, data-driven decisions about your course load.
